meanings.sent1: The stars in the night sky looked coruscant.
meanings.sent2: Her smile was so coruscant that it lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The coruscant decorations on the cake made it look magical.
meanings.sent4: The coruscant water reflected the sunlight like a thousand diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The coruscant dress shimmered under the stage lights.

meanings.sent1: The coruscant sun warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: The coruscant moonlight illuminated the path ahead.
meanings.sent3: The coruscant smile on her face brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The coruscant stars in the sky guided the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The coruscant diamond sparkled in the light.

meanings.sent1: The coruscant sequins on her dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The coruscant snowflakes glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The coruscant jewels on the crown made it look majestic.
meanings.sent4: The coruscant dew on the grass made it look like a fairyland.
meanings.sent5: The coruscant glitter on the artwork made it stand out.

meanings.sent1: The coruscant lightning lit up the dark sky.
meanings.sent2: The coruscant fireworks painted the night with colors.
meanings.sent3: The coruscant camera flashes blinded the celebrities.
meanings.sent4: The coruscant disco ball filled the room with moving lights.
meanings.sent5: The coruscant lighthouse beacon guided the ships safely.
